## Video Tutorial

{{< video https://youtu.be/u5xDKAG-Bgg >}}

#### In this tutorial

Count the number of points in one layer that fall within the polygon boundaries of another layer. In this case, count the number of COVID-19 free meal locations within each City Council district.

## Data downloads

[COVID-19 Free Meals Locations](https://data.cityofnewyork.us/Education/COVID-19-Free-Meals-Locations/sp4a-vevi/about_data)
